attributes.action: Special Air travel for elderly and disabled
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Elderly and disabled people have to wait hours to be admitted on to the plane. Often the get lost or just too tired to walk. My aim is to create special planes with hardly any waiting time for elderly people and more efficiant staff to accompany them. When you are elderly and have this special travel you will be gratful once you have signed this petition. Thank you

rejection.details: Please make your title a clear call for action, not a statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
